name: navigableai-chat-widget
description: Highly customizable chat widget for web applications, supporting any backend or LLM via a custom provider.
author: Navigable AI

scripts.types:sync: echo "Syncing types for main & react app" && cp ./src/types.ts ../react-app/src/types/mainProcess.ts
scripts.dev: nodemon --exec "npm run build:dev" -e ts --ignore dist/* --ignore src/consts.ts
scripts.build: npm run inject-version && rm -rf dist/* && npx tsc --project tsconfig.json || exit 1
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish && git reset --hard HEAD
scripts.copy:dev: npm run types:sync && npm run mkdir:dev && cp -a ./dist/. ../dev-host/js/main-script/
scripts.build:dev: npm run inject-version && npm run build && npm run copy:dev
